## Description {#details}

Information about the plugin required to load its passes.

This struct defines the core interface for pass plugins and is supposed to be filled out by plugin implementors. LLVM-side users of a plugin are expected to use the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passplugin">PassPlugin</a></code> class below to interface with it.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passplugin-h">PassPlugin.h</a>.
